extDescription.message: This extension allow you to know if you are working on your local server or the distant server

error_fill_host_file.message: You need to fill the host file input.

config_not_updated.message: Configuration not updated : Can't create symlink to hosts file. Please check that the file exists and the path is correct.

help_resume.message: In order to that the plugin works properly, please check the following:

vhost_ndd.message: You must create a vhost with the following domain name: is-it-localhost.local

vhost_webroot.message: Please pay attention to the correct Document root of your vhost. You must fill the folder where your plugin is installed

perms_files.message: Please check that permissions on your files and folders are correctly set.

perms_group.message: If you are working with an Apache web server, the user group usally set is "www-data"

gardenmedia_link.message: Realised by the Garden Media community
